feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 04:46 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: NW 40 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:11 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:11 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:11 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
